description: As heavy fighting continues in the Armenia-Azerbaijan conflict, the BBC reports from both sides.
title: Karabakh war leaves civilians shell-shocked and bitter
title_page: Karabakh war leaves civilians shell-shocked and bitter - BBC News
maintext: Ashot's house was struck by a long-range missile, fired he believes from Azerbaijan. We find fragments in the garden. He says the attack happened after the official ceasefire had come into effect. Fortunately, Ashot and his son were in their cellar at the time. That saved them. But the house Ashot built with his own hands has been ripped apart.
